name: Skyrider Sword
description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...

passiveDescription.0: Using an Elemental Burst grants a <cryo>12%</cryo> increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

passiveDescription.4: Using an Elemental Burst grants a <cryo>24%</cryo> increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.
